Linux 进程管理

supervisord

supervisorctl

supervisord will auto load all *.conf file in /etc/supervisor/conf.d/*.conf (configured in /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf, see the files section)

supervisor conf example: [program:nodehook] command=/usr/bin/node /srv/http.js directory=/srv autostart=true autorestart=true startretries=3 stderr_logfile=/var/log/webhook/nodehook.err.log stdout_logfile=/var/log/webhook/nodehook.out.log user=root environment=SECRET_PASSPHRASE=’this is secret’,SECRET_TWO=’another secret’

run: sudo supervisorctl update to load new conf file.
